website_summaries.verdict: Unique modern design provides a quality, stylish drinking experience.
pros: Design is sleek and modern looking
Double walled glass keeps your whiskey at ideal drinking temperature
Decorative lines on the glass go up in 1-ounce increments, making it simple to measure exact amounts
Set includes two silicone ice molds to craft the perfect sized ice cube for your glass
cons: Glasses are delicate and on the lighter side

customer_reviews.title: Greater than even sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: These glassed are great for that afternoon sip of Bourbon. Be careful though. Even though the glass is borosilicate, it is very thin and I don't just drop in the ball ice cubes (or any ice cubes for that matter.), but I tilt the glass and gently let the cube roll in. Stick them in the fridge before using and your drinks will stay cold! Happy (but responsible:-) sipping!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Black

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends aunt and uncle. It came in very nice packaging, plain black box with black foam inside to protect the glasses. The glasses were nice and I liked that the bottom was curved for the ice sphere to sit in perfectly. I also like the markings on the side so you can see how much you're pouring. I would definitely buy this again if I need a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buell

customer_reviews.title: Classy functional and interesting to look at
customer_reviews.text: Look awesome feel different than other whiskey/bourbon/scotch glasses.. not a heavy bottom.. very light..fits the round ice cube very well.. but be careful putting it into a glass that has some liquid in it already lol.. also the little lines on the inside make it easy when inebriated to remake drinks lol
customer_reviews.author: Innterrupt

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less Than a Month
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to gift these to my boyfriend for his birthday. The packaging was great and it really made the glasses special. He really loves them but you can tell that they are very fragile. We have been so careful with them as we wanted them to last. Unfortunately, not even a month later and one has broken. Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Aged & Ore thought of every detail!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this glass set and have been pleased with how easy it is to make a great looking and tasting drink. The glasses are beautiful and it has been really easy for us to measure the perfect amount of alcohol without a shot glass. I love how it is double insulated so my hand stays warm and the drink stays cold. They will be perfect to use over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Claire E Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Been using the glasses and ice mold for the past few days. First off the packaging on this product is beautiful, the glasses were inside a foam insert which keeps the glasses secure and safe from any breakage. But the presentation of the packaging already makes a great first impression. The glasses feel great, have a good weight to it and insulates a cold beverage perfectly. Very happy so far and this would make an awesome gift. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Your guests will think you’re a professional bartender!
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived I immediately filled the easy to use ice ball molds and placed them in my freezer. Several hours later, I placed 1 ball into my precisely poured double shot of Crown, but not before refreezing a fresh set of molds. I repeated the process with the same ice ball once more and then had a couple perfectly mixed old fashioned’s with the remaining ice ball. Pure bliss. Because of the measuring points on the glasses it’s easy to make the perfect pour. It also looks sharp if you’re giving it as a gift. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: David Knobler

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses and ice molds.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses and ice molds. The ice can be less than perfect but works great. I am careful when I put the ice ball in the glass, double wall glasses can be fragile. I get complements all the time on these.
customer_reviews.author: The Brady Report

customer_reviews.title: Updated review Broken
customer_reviews.text: Update: really do like the glasses. The round ice mold is fun. Excellent customer service to help with our broken item. I would buy again. Would make a super gift. So disappointing. Beautiful glasses but broken. Do like the ice ball mold.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Cracked inside
customer_reviews.text: The glass had cracks so when you poured whiskey it leaked to the second vacuum layer
customer_reviews.author: ALVIN T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Whiskey and Scotch Lovers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, high-end packaging. Having two glasses included was a major plus (I helped christen them with a glass of The Balvenie Doublewood 12). Silicone ice molds work well to create the ice ball. Was worried the ice ball would roll out, but it stayed nicely in place even as it melted. Overall, the glasses have been really well received by the person I gave them to...and me, I'll be buying my own soon.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived in an elegant package that would impress any gift giver. Now that I live in Bourbon country, I know these will be used quite often. They are elegant, easy to hold and gorgeous to display. The ice molds are fun and would be great to use for other occasions besides the intended use. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and plan on sharing with my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: ckmiller

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got this gift for an early Father's Day gift and used only a handful of times. Beautiful packaging and design but very fragile. In fact using over this weekend on Father's Day, I was drinking one of my favorite pours and something happened and the glass shattered. I'd like to get a replacement but not sure how to contact the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The essentials for anyone who enjoys a cocktail
customer_reviews.text: These glasses showed up today and I couldn’t be happier. The packaging is clean and elegant. The glasses themselves look like ones you would find in a high end whiskey lounge. I’m in the process of ordering several more of these for gifts for my family. If your looking for an awesome gift idea for Christmas, weddings, or just an awesome gift to give a guy, this is it. Now please excuse me while I go put these bad boys to use. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great sipping glasses
customer_reviews.text: Being a whiskey afficiondo, this is a nice set, very light double walled glass that work well with the ice balls from the molds included
customer_reviews.author: MrMo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for whiskey and scotch drinkers
customer_reviews.text: My hard to please husband loved these glasses. In the past, he's made large ice cubes separately for his low ball glasses, but with the invention of this glass, he doesn't have to any longer. The round ice cubes filled easily and came apart from the mold easily. The glass is the perfect shape. We will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Just received these as a gift and I couldn’t be happier. Ice molds perfectly fit glasses. The 1 oz markers on glass are a whisky lover’s dream. Must have for avid whisky drinkers!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Not just for whiskey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband who likes dirty martinis. The set comes in a super nice box so it's easy for gift-giving. The large cube keeps drinks cold without watering them down (and we're always out of ice anyway). This was for his birthday but I might order more for the holidays. I like sangria in mine!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M, Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Great unique glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are perfect. I love how each one has its own little differences. The Ice globes fit perfectly in the glass and keep my drinks cool. No condensation on the outside of the glass means no wet tables or wet hands. And the ounce markers make it so easy to pour the perfect drink, never too strong or too weak!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very weak glass
customer_reviews.text: Inside of glass shattered on the first use. We gently slid the ice cube in and it destroyed the bottom of the glass from the inside. Dangerous if we had not caught that as the outside of the glass was still intact. Very weak. Would it recommend as a gift or for yourself. Maybe a display? That’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Dockrey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Feels really good in my hands. Exactly what I wanted. Nicely packaged as well.
customer_reviews.author: M.Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: The ice molds make round ice balls that fit the glass perfectly, melt slowly, and complement the flavor of your drink to make it taste better. The double blown walls of the glass provide an insulating factor that further slows ice melt and keeps your drink colder. I intend to buy another set for my bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wedding gift for someone not real close. Want one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Marifrances

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of ice cube!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great idea but when we put the round ice cube in the glass, it shattered the inside glass, leaving the glass completely unusable and had to be thrown away. The company replaced the glass for me. Just be careful when adding the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Allen

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass! A unique piece of barware that really stands out with the handblown features. The one ounce pour indicators make it quick and easy to mix fancy cocktails even for an amateur mixologist like myself. I recommend it to whiskey sippers and cocktail drinkers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kleinertz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: These glasses came recommended by a whiskey aficionado friend. We purchased them to pair with a bottle of top shelf whiskey as a charity auction item. Great look. Great price. Will be able to list for bid at well more than we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: True Lt a great whisky glass. Wish it were a little heavier though. Big ice cube helps but not when drinking neat.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Sigli

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, classy glass set
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful. They were bigger than I expected. My dad loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite rocks glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Attractive glasses, double-walled so they don’t sweat much in the hand or on the table, nice weight, integrated 1oz fill lines if you want to mix in them, easy to use ice ball molds, all of this makes for a perfect drink and the high-end packaging also makes them great for gifts. These will definitely be my go to rocks glasses.
customer_reviews.author: MikeA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father’s Day gift for my husband and he loves the set!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loved them! These glasses are great - definitely the most versatile cocktail glass that we own. The day they arrived, my husband immediately poured a glass of scotch neat. A few days later, we made gin cocktails. Overall, these glasses make for an exceptional drinking experience! My only regret is not buying four!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but very fragile!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful looking but very fragile. I placed an ice ball in one glass, the ice ball rolled to the bottom of the glass and shattered the inner glass layer! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying them. Keep the taste, ice last longer. Really good!
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Reyes

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful product.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift for Christmas. Got to use them with the recipient and let me tell you it was excellent. They are well packaged so they won't break during Transportation and look excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: NIce whiskey glasses
customer_reviews.text: beautifully packaged. Iceballs hard to fill without a funnel. Glasses are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: staylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a couple of these and they're great. Even without the ice cubes they make for good chilled glasses for drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Cook

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of glass shattered
customer_reviews.text: Only used 2 times and the glass broke on the bottom. The ice ball was too cold for the glass and it shattered the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: meagswms

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: This was our second set of glasses, they have already cracked less than a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michaela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love the measuring lines and the ice ball is a perfect fit. Great for all cocktail lovers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev Chhabra

customer_reviews.title: Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is perfect for great looking gift and product makes a great/easy to measure cocktail.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are beautiful as is the packaging. The ice mold is a great touch as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best whiskey glasses one could buy
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship is just amazing, glasses are light and are so beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ssiddh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for my husband and he absolutely loves them. He has told all of his whiskey/bourbon drinking friends about them.
customer_reviews.author: Simply European

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses and ice ball molds. Very stylish and lightweight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kris gargani

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for cocktail lovers! Got these for my brother in law that is a bourbon drinker and he loves them. Gorgeous packaging and cool ice molds.
customer_reviews.author: kristen olson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for whisky lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who loves whisky ( I bought the competing set) on the recommendation of Tim Ferriss. Great Christmas gift. Checked back with him and he loves it. The insulation of double glass and the ice molds make a fun experience. I may have to buy this for myself next year. These kinds of glass are easily broken and depending on how many glasses consumed, hard to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of 4 as a gift, the packaging was really superb and sleek. The glasses themselves are very modern and cool looking but I imagined them to be a little heavier and feel more "expensive" the glass is light that it almost feels plasticky. But overall, they look really cool and the person recieving the gift was really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lenags

customer_reviews.title: Great product, super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are super nice and having the ice molds is also pretty sweet. The packaging is top notch and was super impressed with that portion of the product as I have designed packaging myself. The only thing about these glasses that makes me nervous is they're so light. It feels as though one wrong bump or rough placement and they could get damaged but so far so good and we haven't crossed that bridge yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Brown

customer_reviews.title: The best whiskey glass around!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best whiskey glass I’ve found and I’ve shopped around! This glass is gorgeous and functional. I love how the ice ball fits perfectly in the bottom and seemingly lasts forever. It also doesn’t sweat on the bottom. Useful for mixed drinks too since it has ounce markers. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase, love sharing these glasses with friends!
customer_reviews.author: John Lee Grogan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, will shatter with the drop of the ice ball made from included mold.
customer_reviews.text: What were the manufacturers thinking when designing these glasses! Just dropping in the ice ball (from the molds included in kits) cracked the bottom of the glasses, it happened on two of the six I purchased, I won't use the others for fear of the same thing happening. These glasses needed to be manufactured with durability in mind, instead they are cheaply made. Good concept, terrible execution. I would appreciate a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Polson

customer_reviews.title: Great set in nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging - it looks very fancy. The glasses are great because they can go in the dishwasher and are very durable. The ice molds work great and fit perfectly in the glasses. Would purchase again or as a gift in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Picatti

customer_reviews.title: Ice cube molds provide perfect ice cubes for well need glasses
customer_reviews.text: Finally, ice cubes that fit perfectly inside a glass, stay cold for hours, and two beautiful double-walled glasses to boot
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Feel great in hand
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very classy and the glasses have a nice look and feel - they look like they would be too heavy but they are not in the least. Ice molds were a nice touch, have not used them yet but plan to. Great for entertaining, will likely buy another set to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Aamer A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. The ice ball fits perfectly in it and the glass keeps the drink cold for a long while. They are my new favorite glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Needham

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product until one of the glasses broke or cracked really was great on a hot day at least I still have one 😕
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Ice Balls
customer_reviews.text: My SIL went nuts over this set. He loved the ice balls the most.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Premium look and feel. Keeps the temp of the drink stable longer and seems to enhance the nose and taste of the whisky. And the packaging is EXCELLENT👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: butch uyguanco

customer_reviews.title: Best Rocks Glass
customer_reviews.text: Best Rocks Glass I've used - Packing is phenomenal. Ice Ball Mold Included on my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Irish

product_meta.title: Aged & Ore - The Duo Glass | Hand Blown Double Walled Whiskey Glass Gift Set with Free Silicone Ice Molds | Integrated Measuring Lines for the Perfect Cocktail | Durable Modern Tumbler | Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Expertly Crafted Drinks & Cocktails

Are you looking for a fun gift for a special whiskey, drinking or cocktail enthusiast?

The Aged & Ore duo glass was designed to create a better drinking and cocktail experience by offering premium construction and our special patent pending integrated measuring lines.

Enjoy perfectly poured and always consistent glasses of your favorite liquors and cocktails.

Perfectly Smooth & Chilled

Our unique bell-shaped inner glass design can make your whiskey, spirit or cocktails actually taste smoother and enhance subtle aromas from the various ingredients or liquors.

The premium silicone ice molds create perfect ice spheres that are designed to nest within the duo glass. The large spheres are very slow to melt and will keep your drinks potent, smooth and cold for hours on end.

Our double walled vacuum insulation keeps your drinks cold, while preventing the outside of your glass from being too cold to touch comfortably.

A Unique Handblown Gift

The duo glass and integrated measuring lines are all handblown from borosilicate glass.

Unlike some other companies, we don’t use cheap leaded glass from China.

Our premium gift box will keep your glasses and ice molds organized and protected. The box looks great when gifting as a wedding gift, bachelor gift, bachelorette gift or simply a gorgeous house warming present.

Join thousands of happy whiskey enthusiasts, cocktail lovers and customers…Click Add-to-Cart to order your duo glass gift set Today!
feature_bullets: DOUBLE WALLED INSULATION - We've crafted a superior whiskey and spirits glass. Our unique vacuum insulation helps keep your whiskey at the perfect chilled temperature for literally hours on end. Our hand-blown borosilicate glass is lightweight and comfortable to carry or hold.

SMOOTHER TASTE - Our unique bell shaped cocktail glass is designed to give better aromatics and ethanol aeration than traditional low ball glasses or nosing glasses. That means your whiskey, scotch, bourbon or alcohol of choice will taste smoother and more easily express its subtle flavor profiles.

PERFECT POURS - The duo glass features specially patented integrated measuring lines so that you can perfectly measure cocktails and mixed drinks without using a shaker or jigger. Each of the 8 lines perfectly matches 1 oz of liquor or beverage. Now you can easily make consistent drinks every time.

A SPECIAL GIFT - Each duo glass kit comes in a premium padded gift box with 2 unique hand-blown glasses and 2 silicone ice sphere molds. Give it as a gift to a special cocktail connoisseur you know or as a housewarming, groomsmen, or graduation present. Give a gift they'll actually use and enjoy.

FREE PREMIUM ICE MOLDS - As a special bonus we've included 2 easy to use silicone ice cube molds. They make smooth ice spheres which perfectly match the unique duo glass bell shape. That's awesome because it means most of your liquid is always in contact with solid ice for a hearty chilled drink.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
